params.senderX: uint256 first component of msg.sender's public key
params.senderY: uint256 second component of msg.sender's public key

params.hashedSecretASecretB: bytes32 hash of secretA concatenated with secretB
params.preImage: bytes32 the value that once hashed produces recipients hashedSecret

params.amount: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer
params.operatorData: bytes extra information provided by the operator (if any)
params.userData: bytes extra information provided by the token holder (if any)

claimChannelClosure(address).notice: If the timeout is reached without the 'counterParty' reedeming a ticket, then the tokens can be claimed by 'msg.sender'.claim channel's closure

fundChannelWithSig(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Fund a channel between 'initiator' and 'counterParty' using a signature, specified tokens must be approved beforehand.fund a channel

initiateChannelClosure(address).notice: A channel's party can initiate channel closure at any time, it starts a timeout.initiate channel's closure

tokensReceived(address,address,address,u.notice: A hook triggered when HOPR tokens are send to this contract.
